properties.title: Schilthorn
properties.abstract: Here you meet with the most stunning 360 degrees panoramic views throughout the entire Alps region. Enjoy the magnificient mountain world of the Bernese Oberland by following in James Bond's footsteps on the 3000 m high Schilthorn.
properties.description:
In the world’s first revolving restaurant, at an altitude of almost 3,000 meters above sea level, visitors delight in both culinary and scenic highlights as panoramic mountain scenery and over 200 spectacular summits silently slip by. Views extend from the Titlis, over the Bernese Alps, Mont Blanc and Mittelland all the way to the Schwarzwald Black Forest.

The Piz Gloria revolving restaurant (2,970 m) turns a full round in 45 minutes, offering time to enjoy a delicious bite to eat along with most palatable scenic views of nature pure. We can think of no better way to enjoy almost birds-eye views of the Jura, Bernese Alps, Mont Blanc and never ending alternating views of pristine lakes, valleys and majestic mountains.
properties.name: Schilthornbahn AG
